Articles.Content:
Just a quick question: Can a target be selected by double-clicking it in vessel view? i.e. I have a plane I want to shoot with some Sepratrons, and I don't want to go into map view. Will double-clicking it give me a target marker on the navball?

Thanks!

Edited August 2, 2014 by DuoDex
Now answered.
It should, but the interface can be wonky, especially at extreme range. If you get within a kilometer or so you should be fine.
